---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Report a maintenance or housekeeping task
title: "Maintenance: [Short description]"
labels: maintenance, needs-triage
assignees:

---

## Maintenance Guidelines

### Task Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

### Impact
Explain the impact of this maintenance task (e.g., performance improvement, code cleanup).

### Timeline
Proposed timeline for completing the task.

### Dependencies
Any dependencies or prerequisites for this task.
